chapters.title: Chapter 4:  A Deal
chapters.info:
Dannil Lewin,
      p. 159â€”Young man
      from Emond's Field, now leader of Perrin's
      soldiers from the Two Rivers.  A bean-pole of a man with a thick
      mustache.  He is Tell's brother.
      See also
      al'Seen, Bandry;
      Lewin, Tell.
